info.author: Darren Kirby
info.description:
wmainfo-py is a library for reading low level information from files 
encapsulated in an Advanced Systems Format header. Files of this type 
typically have a .wma extension for audio only files and .wmv for video files.

wmainfo-py can currently extract the following information:
* Content, size and offset of objects in the ASF_Header_Object
* Meta-tags from the ASF_Content_Description_Object
* Information from the ASF_File_Properties_Object (filesize, bitrate, creation 
date etc)
* Additional tags/info from ASF_Extended_Content_Description_Object

Version 0.3 can parse Asf_Stream_Property_Object and Asf_Audio_Media objects
info.name: wmainfo-py
info.html_description:
wmainfo-py is a library for reading low level information from files encapsulated in an Advanced Systems Format header. Files of this type typically have a .wma extension for audio only files and .wmv for video files.

wmainfo-py can currently extract the following information: * Content, size and offset of objects in the ASF_Header_Object * Meta-tags from the ASF_Content_Description_Object * Information from the ASF_File_Properties_Object (filesize, bitrate, creation date etc) * Additional tags/info from ASF_Extended_Content_Description_Object

Version 0.3 can parse Asf_Stream_Property_Object and Asf_Audio_Media objects
